title: Unknown ornament
content:
This may be a post for the type id forum. I am looking for a font and/or a book containing this ornament. I have looked through the Dover series of book with no luck. Any help would be appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019095244im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ornament.gif)
author: Tom Cannon

comments.content:
No time to draw it?

(Just givin' you a hard time.)
Panera Bread catalog. I have seen it used in other places. Can someone recommend a good ornament book besides the Dover series.

That early advertising book that was mentioned in another thread would be good.

A few that are sorta kinda similar: [Fleurons Two](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019095244/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/fleurons-two/fleurons-two/charmap.html), [Altemus Arabesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019095244/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/altemus/arabesques/altemus-arabesques/charmap.html)

Closer: [Polytype Artimus frames](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019095244/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfprimegraphics/polytype-artimus-i-frames/), [Poly Artimus frames II](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019095244/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfprimegraphics/polytype-artimus-ii-frames/)
